revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cerulean Cave |image = [[File:Cerulean Cave.png|400px]] |caption = An overhead map of Cerulean Cave. |tokens = 2,500 |location = North of Cerulean City. }} '''Cerulean Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 28,735 |- | Rhydon (Boss) || 143,675 |- | Mewtwo (Boss) || 215,512 |}
==Pokémon==
* Arbok * Raichu * Sandslash * Golbat * Parasect * Venomoth * Kadabra * Magneton * Dodrio * Hypno * Ditto * Wigglytuff * Electrode * Marowak * Cahnsey * Rhydon (boss) * Mewtwo (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 25% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 25% |}
